Package com.simulation

Class MovingBase

java.lang.Object
com.simulation.Unit
com.simulation.MovingUnit
com.simulation.MovingBase
class MovingBase
extends MovingUnit
Moving base moves on the map and delivers supplies to ArmyUnits (if has any usesLeft). It can be destroyed by trap or resupplied by main base.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) int ammoToGive
    ammo amount that will be given to armyUnit
    private static int deadMovingBase
    helpful variable to save stats to file
    private int usesLeft
    number of uses for movingBase. it can be increased by base to the initial value

    • MovingBase

      public MovingBase​(int id, Map map, int movement)
      constructor for MovingBase
      Parameters:
      id - id of unit
      map - map the unit will spawn on
      movement - max amount of fields that unit can move in one turn

  • Method Details

    • setUsesLeft

    • setDeadMovingBase

      public static void setDeadMovingBase​(int deadMovingBase)

    • resupply

      void resupply​(ArmyUnit armyUnit)
      Gives specific amount of ammo to alive ArmyUnit (if ArmyUnit has not full ammo). Each gift lowers the usesLeft by 1.
      Parameters:
      armyUnit - armyUnit that will be resupplied

    • move

      void move​(Map map, UnitCreator uc)
      makes movingBase move on the map and interact with other units. If the field is free, it takes the field.
      Specified by:
      move in class MovingUnit
      Parameters:
      map - map on which the moving base will move
      uc - list of Units

    • takeField

      private void takeField​(Field newField)
      occupies field if it is free for MovingBase
      Parameters:
      newField - field that would be occupied

    • die

      void die()
      sets usesLeft to 0 and sets the field free
